caption_text:
Our biggest venue yet ✨

Welcome to The Conrad Centre for the Performing Arts 🎭

Featuring an epic sound system, spring floors, and space for 300+ community members to dance freely.

It’s easy to get excited… but really, this venue is just a canvas — waiting for *us* to make our mark.

Awaken returns to KW on December 6th.
🔥🔥🔥

If  like to join us, tickets + details are in our bio.

#soberdanceparty #kitchener #waterloo #danceparty #ecstaticdance #thingstodokitchener #event
